########## Leaderboard snapshot of Data was downloaded on 12-28-2021 ##########

import numpy as np 
import pandas as pd 
import seaborn as sns
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
source.b43756cc:
# Load the data into a pandas dataframe

file = ("../input/feedback-prize-lb-20211228/feedback-prize-2021-publicleaderboard.csv")
Public_LB = pd.read_csv(file)
source.0fb6b7d9:
# Preview the data (top twelve are financial winners in this competition)

Public_LB.head(12) # In the money $$$$$$
source.1e355c7b:
# Take just the "Score" column for analysis

score_vector = Public_LB["Score"]
hist = sns.histplot(data=score_vector, bins=100)
source.d2d3662f:
########## Plot the CDF of LB Scores ##########

# Arrange the data for PDF and CDF
count, bins_count = np.histogram(score_vector, bins=100)
  # Find the PDF of the data using count values
pdf = count / sum(count)
  # Calculate the CDF
cdf = np.cumsum(pdf)
  # Plotting the PDF and the CDF:
#plt.plot(bins_count[1:], pdf, color="red", label="PDF")
plt.plot(bins_count[1:], cdf, label="CDF")
plt.xlabel("Score")
plt.legend()
